original_title: Over 18,000 netted so far under Operation Yukthiya
original_body_lines: 18,107 suspects have been arrested under Operation Yukthiya, from the 17th of December to 12.30 am today.
Police say that in the 24-hour window that ended at 12.30 am today, 1,554 were arrested under Operation Yukthiya.
Drugs including Heroin, ICE and cannabis, were seized during the drug raids carried out.
